programme.desc: Animal Fight Night: 'Plan of Attack' showcases nature's most brutal battle plans and how an intelligent attack can be the difference between victory and death. Using a mix of ultra-rare wildlife footage, exclusive user generated content and ground breaking computer animation, 'Plan of Attack' proves that in the wild, brain power can be as potent a weapon as muscle power..

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: The Christmas Island red crab is a land bound crab that still has strong ties to the ocean, the only place where they can give birth to their young.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: This family farm needs a barn! The Pols are ready to tackle their next big project: preserving and carefully taking down a 100-year-old barn since, with every piece they remove makes the barn weaker and weaker. There is no room for error if they are going to transport these irreplaceable beams back to the farm and restore it to its former glory. .

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: It‚Äôs been a year of farming for the Pol family. Even with Charles recovering from his injury, the farm‚Äôs showing no signs of slowing down! Beth takes the next step with her bees to grow the colony and harvest honey. Charles and Ben come up with a final fix for the sheep hut‚Äôs drainage problem. The whole family comes together to plant the garden and celebrate a successful year on the farm.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs. Cheetah
programme.desc: Big Cat Wars will showcase an incredibly unique stock footage sequence of a moment when a predator on predator conflict turns deadly. The clip of lion vs cheetah is a nail biting moment that will shock, but in the end will shed new light on the mysterious relationship between these extraordinary big cats and their life-and-death struggle for survival.

programme.title: Jaguar Beach
programme.desc: On a remote stretch of Central America‚Äôs Pacific coast, the lush, volcanic landscape gives way to a startlingly different world: a dry tropical forest. Here, two creatures ‚Äî the sea turtle and the jaguar ‚Äî meet with spectacular consequences for both their species and the very different environments they inhabit, and an unwitting alliance turns the predator into the protector.

programme.title: The Pack
programme.desc: The story here examines the tactics used by a pride of South African lions as they hunt three distinct prey animals in the Singita Game Reserve. We'll analyze the Pride's unique strategies as they pursue zebra, impala, and ultimately the tallest land animal, the giraffe.

programme.title: Cecil: The Legacy of A King
programme.desc: Hwange's lions are rumored to be some of the biggest wild lions on the planet. One magnificent beast was destined to become one of Africa's most famous animals. He was known as Cecil. While his demise at the hand of hunters was splashed across the media, sparking fury in all who heard his tale, Cecil's story before he was posthumously iconized is worthy of celebrating.

programme.title: Land Of The Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Sierra Morena is a mountain range of climatic extremes. The harsh winter puts the lynxes of the Jandula River Valley to the test. Golden eagles, otters, wild boars and cormorants struggle to survive in the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: The Pack
programme.desc: The story here examines the tactics used by a pride of South African lions as they hunt three distinct prey animals in the Singita Game Reserve. We'll analyze the Pride's unique strategies as they pursue zebra, impala, and ultimately the tallest land animal, the giraffe.

programme.title: Leopard Kingdom
programme.desc: Karula, the Queen of Djuma, reigned over South Africas Sabi Sand for over a decade. But now, the queen is gone. Her offspring now hope to claim the land that was once hers. .

programme.title: A Leopard's Legacy
programme.desc: A confident and powerful leopardess named Olimba, rules over an exceptionally large area along Zambia‚Äôs Luangwa river. She is a formidable hunter, a courageous ruler, and a devoted mother. She‚Äôs just given birth to two tiny cubs, and as she faces the challenging task of motherhood, it‚Äôs a constant battle to hunt successfully, to defend her prime territory, and to protect her cubs against her enemies.

programme.title: Serengeti Speed Queen
programme.desc: Nzuri is the Speed Queen of the Serengeti - but being fast isn‚Äôt enough. She‚Äôs constantly bullied by hyenas on the grassland and hunted by lions in the marsh. When two of her cubs are killed, the family is exiled to the transition forest. There, she learns to adapt her hunting methods and adds strategy to speed in order to outwit her enemies and steer her remaining cubs successfully to adulthood.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol and his staff spring into action to treat a variety of cases flooding the clinic. After one glance of the wound, Dr. Pol rushes a horrific canine emergency straight into surgery. While Dr. Nicole wrangles arms full of adorable puppies for check-ups. Their expertise proves handy on all cases sweeping the clinic.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: It‚Äôs the dog days of winter and the pups keep piling into the clinic. Busted legs, bulbous cysts, and overgrown nails fill the docs‚Äô doggy docket. Dr. Pol faces a family of farm animals, an evasive Angus, and a fearsome Chihuahua. Meanwhile, the PVS Vets run tests on reindeer, hightail it to a hypothermic horse, and care for a constipated cat. From limps to lumps, the docs are ready for anything.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Zoo: Tampa The Wild Side Updates
programme.desc: Animal caretakers pull out all the stops to ensure Zoo Tampa is a safe and enriching home for every animal. A birthday celebration is put on hold when a clouded leopard becomes sick. A beloved tamandua develops a suspicious lump. And an injured mother-calf manatee pair discovered in the wild begins their rehabilitation journey at Zoo Tampa.

programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets: 2024 Reptile Compilation
programme.desc: The docs take care of pets with scales and shells. A boa won't eat; Taft the tortoise needs some hands-on help with a blockage; Hodges must MacGyver a repair for a box turtle's broken shell. A snake with pneumonia needs the team's help, & a blue-tongued skink comes in for a checkup. Finally, a king snake needs eye surgery and the team gets up close and personal with a variety of venomous snakes.
